Package Controllers

Class MovieEditController

java.lang.Object
Controllers.MovieEditController
All Implemented Interfaces:
INavigation
public class MovieEditController extends Object implements INavigation
MovieEditController is a Navigation that manages the logic and flow for booking of movie tickets
Since:
2022-11-11
Version:
1.0
Author:
Shawn Yap Zheng Yi

    • gotoSearchMoviesSystem

      public Movie[] gotoSearchMoviesSystem()
      Calls SearchMovieController to retrieve a list of movies by name
      Returns:
      list of movies filtered by the substring of a given string input
